keyMoments.title: Epoida's Debut at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Epoida, a New World pirate captain allied with Whitebeard, makes his anime debut during the Battle of Marineford. He is characterized by his caterpillar theme and possesses a Devil Fruit power related to caterpillars.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the many New World allies that Whitebeard has gathered to rescue Ace.

keyMoments.title: Amadob's Debut at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Amadob, a large New World pirate captain allied with Whitebeard, makes his anime debut. He is a round man with big dark-colored lips, curly blonde hair, and wears royal attire with an elaborate crown and a colorful, polka-dotted shirt.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of Whitebeard's New World allies participating in the Battle of Marineford.

keyMoments.title: Karma's Debut at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Karma, captain of the Takotopus Pirates and a New World pirate allied with Whitebeard, makes his anime debut. He has an octopus theme characteristic to his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces another of Whitebeard's New World allies in the battle to rescue Ace.

reveals.information: Captain of the Takotopus Pirates, allied with Whitebeard

keyMoments.title: Kinga's Debut at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Kinga, a New World pirate captain allied with Whitebeard, makes his anime debut. He is a rather tall man with brown hair sticking up into the air and a thin mustache, wearing an open blue shirt.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the diverse New World captains allied with Whitebeard for the Battle of Marineford.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Declares He'll Save Ace Even If It Means Death
keyMoments.description: After defeating a giant Vice Admiral with Gear Third, Luffy shouts at Ace that he will save him 'even if it means death,' demonstrating his unwavering resolve and moving the Whitebeard Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's absolute commitment to saving his brother, earning Whitebeard's respect and protection.
keyMoments.quote: I'll save you even if it means death!

keyMoments.title: Luffy Revealed as Dragon's Son
keyMoments.description: Fleet Admiral Sengoku publicly reveals to the world that Luffy is the son of Monkey D. Dragon, the Revolutionary Army's leader and the World Government's most wanted criminal. This revelation shocks everyone at Marineford and transforms how the world perceives Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most critical revelations in the series, exposing Luffy's dangerous heritage to the world and massively raising the stakes for his survival.

relationships.description: Luffy is revealed to be the son of Monkey D. Dragon, the leader of the Revolutionary Army.

evolutionMoments.description: Sengoku publicly reveals to the world that Luffy is Dragon's son.

reveals.information: Son of Monkey D. Dragon, the Revolutionary
